title: Telegram Mini Apps are 'Trojan horse’ for mass blockchain adoption: TON Investments Director
description:
Onboarding the next 500 million users will require simple apps with “actual usability,” TON’s Hyun told Cointelegraph.

The blockchain-based mini-decentralized applications (dApps) on Telegram, also known as Mini Apps, could be a “Trojan horse” for mass blockchain adoption.

Justin Hyun, the director of investments at TON Foundation, told Cointelegraph:

Telegram Mini Apps launched in 2020 as an open platform allowing Web3 businesses to deploy crypto-friendly apps directly within the messaging app Telegram.

Read more

title: Binance-backed HKVAEX shuts down, gives users 30 days to withdraw amid Hong Kong regulatory tightening
description:
Binance-linked HKVAEX exchange is closing down and has withdrawn its application for an operational license in Hong Kong, according to a notice on the Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) website. The crypto trading platform, operating under the name BX Services Ltd, formally withdrew its license application on March 28, approximately three months after it applied […]

The post Binance-backed HKVAEX shuts down, gives users 30 days to withdraw amid Hong Kong regulatory tightening appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin ETFs surpass $12 billion in net inflows as GBTC selling slows
description:
Quick Take BitMEX data shows that the Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witnessed another day of net inflows on March 28, totaling $183.0 million, equivalent to 2,587.9 BTC. This marks the fourth consecutive day of inflows. While the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) experienced outflows of $104.9 million, equivalent to 1,482.8 BTC, this figure represents the […]

The post Bitcoin ETFs surpass $12 billion in net inflows as GBTC selling slows appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Relic Entertainment Becomes Independent After Sale by Sega Europe
description: An RTS developer, Relic Entertainment, situated close to Vancouver, has completely modified its ownership. Relic is known for the Company of Heroes series, which is in the second installment, and the Dawn of War sequel.  The studio Sega Europe, the earlier parent company, is owned by another firm and is being sold due to restructuring.
